comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: Missed ad server

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

labels.name: Stale
labels.description: The issue is considered as obsolete

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

**NSFW** - https://turkifsaalemi.com/2022/07/18/universiteli-sevval-efsane-bol-videolu/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Turkish filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, EasyList

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

**Steps to reproduce**

1- Go to `https://turkifsaalemi.com/2022/07/18/universiteli-sevval-efsane-bol-videolu/` and click on the `mail.ru` link

https://i.imgur.com/YPs0GNl.png


2-It will direct you to `kisalt.digital.com` 

<details>
 <summary>Screenshot</summary>
 
![resim](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/109369779/179882970-3f2d8164-6719-4ca0-a31d-64cfcb2340b2.png)


</details>

3- Open DevTool and click `Preserve log` then click `İÇERİĞE GİT`. Go back to `kisalt.digital` and look at the network requests.

<details>
 <summary>Screenshot</summary>

![resim](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/109369779/179881804-897daba4-eb05-4301-b671-7f7175d3b83f.png)


</details>


4- When you click on the `İÇERİĞE GİT` button, an advertisement pop-up window will also open.

<details>
 <summary>Screenshot</summary>
 
![resim](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/109369779/179881089-2b97f0d1-efa0-49b2-b701-cc6d4f4694f7.png)


</details>

---

Advertising windows will not open when `pophit.net` is blocked.


### Privacy

issue.title: Missed ad server

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

**NSFW** - https://turkifsaalemi.com/2022/07/18/universiteli-sevval-efsane-bol-videolu/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Turkish filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, EasyList

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

**Steps to reproduce**

1- Go to `https://turkifsaalemi.com/2022/07/18/universiteli-sevval-efsane-bol-videolu/` and click on the `mail.ru` link

https://i.imgur.com/YPs0GNl.png


2-It will direct you to `kisalt.digital.com` 

<details>
 <summary>Screenshot</summary>
 
![resim](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/109369779/179882970-3f2d8164-6719-4ca0-a31d-64cfcb2340b2.png)


</details>

3- Open DevTool and click `Preserve log` then click `İÇERİĞE GİT`. Go back to `kisalt.digital` and look at the network requests.

<details>
 <summary>Screenshot</summary>

![resim](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/109369779/179881804-897daba4-eb05-4301-b671-7f7175d3b83f.png)


</details>


4- When you click on the `İÇERİĞE GİT` button, an advertisement pop-up window will also open.

<details>
 <summary>Screenshot</summary>
 
![resim](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/109369779/179881089-2b97f0d1-efa0-49b2-b701-cc6d4f4694f7.png)


</details>

---

Advertising windows will not open when `pophit.net` is blocked.


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: e.mail.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
### ВНИМАНИЕ

Пользователям программы для `Windows`, `macOS` или `Android` нужно включить расширение `AdGuard Extra` в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить [расширение AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra#how-to-install-adguard-extra) либо скрипт `AdGuard Extra`(этот вариант может не везде срабатыавать). 

<details><summary>Установка скрипта  "AdGuard Extra" в расширение "Tampermonkey"  :</summary>

Для установки скрипта понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

</details>

Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
Не повторяется с вашими настройками.
Попробуйте выключить и снова включить контент-блокеры в настройках Сафари, а также обновить фильтры Адгарда.
Важно не закрывать окно Адгарда при обновлении фильтров в течение 30-60 секунд, иначе iOS прервёт процесс применения фильтров.

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
> @luckycoinblu
> 
> > При просмотре видео на Facebook появляется "сейчас появится реклама" и дальше то что на скринах. Реклама не из сторонних плагинов, вирусов или еще чего, а именно встроена в видеопоток Facebook. Так же на фильтре DNS стоит AdguardHome. Пробовал самостоятельно посмотреть список фильтрации, но ничего такого не нашел.
> 
> А какой регион? С VPN, если пользуетесь, что-нибудь меняется? У меня видео стартует без рекламной вставки.

UA. Нет, не меняется. Видео у меня тоже стартует без рекламной вставки, но из 4-5 видео которые идут потоком обязательно 1-2-3 рекламы будет в середине. Не в каждом видео, бывает несколько видео без рекламы, а бывает в каждом без исключений. Какой-то рандом. Но реклама есть.

issue.title: yottlyscript.com is not a 3rd party tracker
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.0.204

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://moodo.pl/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Tracking Protection filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Hello,

I would like to ask if it would be possible to remove from https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/SpywareFilter/sections/tracking_servers.txt the entry for `||yottlyscript.com^`.

`yottlyscript.com `does not use 3rd party cookies nor is it involved in the advertising system, this script is only used for internal site personalization (i.e. only products of that site are offered on that page).

For example, on the homepage of `https://moodo.pl/` the widget containing personalised products is not visible - please see the screenshot.

If any information needs to be added, feel free to contact me.

Thank you very much for your cooperation

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32652690/181260372-a2cb9f00-4198-4eb6-b9c5-154a9cbe7c65.png)


</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

Any suggestions on filters/functions to disable to see if that fixes it?

again.

I'm going to change from the latest nightly to the latest beta.  I haven't
seen a nightly update in over a month.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
